article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16NRZBu hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Jihadist From Phoenix

div.p: Eric Harroun claims to have joined up with an al Qaeda-linked group fighting in Syria’s brutal civil war. We tracked him down, but getting the truth was more difficult.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15wKYli hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Jihadi Web Forums Are Losing Members To Twitter, Facebook, Death

div.p: This may have been a fake jihadi Facebook page from 2010, but a prominent terror theorist is lamenting that the real thing is killing off online extremist forums.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZGffgO hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Online News Outlet That Pays Its Staff Only In High Fives

div.p: Felice News is a Canadian organization that labels itself as "the world's largest and most popular all-positive news outlet," and claims that it is "all run by reporters aged 12 to 25." All of the reporters and staff are so all-positive, it turns out, that they don't even need to get paid.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZEoZIl hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Agent Who Protected Presidents On The Factual Accuracy Of 'Olympus Has Fallen'

div.p: 'Olympus Has Fallen' director Antoine Fuqua sought out a good deal of Secret Service advice on how to craft his thriller. One of the technical consultants was Dr. Joe Bannon who has protected scores of presidents and even the popemobile.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WSrFUf hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Unintended, Deadly Consequences Of Living In The Industrialized World

div.p: How dirt explains why some of the wealthiest countries suffer from afflictions rarely seen in less-developed nations.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15Av4X1 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Where In The World Are All The Billionaires?

div.p: For the 27th annual Forbes billionaires list, our team of reporters spent months tracking down the wealthiest people around the globe. Ultimately, we found 1,426 billionaires who are together worth a total of $5.4 trillion — a record sum.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-105krtz hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WE THOUGHT THEY WENT TO LAW SCHOOL

h2.a: Entrepreneurship Program Gives Former Prostitutes A Fresh Start

div.p: A program at Imperial College London helps women who have been forced into prostitution start a new life as entrepreneurs.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xv9RKP hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Rich Americans Should Drop Their War On Genetically Modified Foods

div.p: Upper crust grocery stores like Whole Foods are taking a moral stand against genetically modified meat and vegetables, even though these products could help solve hunger for billions.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14c6Tln hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Will Old People Take Over The World?

div.p: One of the consequences of radical life extension is the potential for a gerontocracy to set in — the entrenchment of a senior elite who will hold on to their power and wealth, while dominating politics, finance, and academia.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZFXKgr hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Announcing Openbeta

div.p: Inside the betaworks studio, we build lots of new things each year. We’re firm believers in the open web and we’re firm believers in betas, so today we’ve decided to extend our community to anyone who wants to test our new products before they’re officially released. This expansion is part of a broader initiative here that we’re calling Openbeta.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11tdlE7 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: IF YOU SMELL WHAT IRAQ IS COOKING

h2.a: Why Pro Wrestling Is Perfect For The Modern Middle East

div.p: Avoiding a people's elbow or tombstone piledriver in a flowing white thobe and leather sandals is about as difficult as it sounds, so Qataris leave that to the spandex-clad professionals.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10sIzJ1 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 20 Visual Recipes

div.p: We recently posted a collection of infographics to help you outfit your kitchen and that got us in the mood to do some cooking. But following text recipes can be cumbersome. It’s so easy to lose your place in the text directions every time you turn around to crack an egg or add some spices.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15A2dlJ hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: JUST LIKE THE PLOT TO 'HALF BAKED'

h2.a: North Korea Ordered Its Foreign Diplomats To Become Drug Dealers

div.p: North Korea ordered its diplomats in some number of foreign embassies, including at least one in Eastern Europe, to sell illegal drugs on the streets.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11pGTih hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: For One Week, My Incredible Pebble Smartwatch Was All It Promised To Be – And Then It Stopped Working

div.p: The Pebble is intriguing, and I might have picked a bad apple. But with big Apple looming, a young company must grow up quick.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y2eoYG hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Facebook Shocked That A Woman Runs 'I F*cking Love Science' Page

div.p: When the owner of the most popular science page on Facebook revealed her identity the other day, the reaction was sadly predictable. "OMG GIRL," came the crescendo of comments from dumbfounded men (and a few women). It was as if Elise Andrew had infiltrated a 19th century scientific conference and suddenly ripped off a fake mustache in front of the assembled muttering menfolk. Cue pipes falling from open mouths.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yhmbo1 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How I Accidentally Got An A In My English Class With Professor Vladmir Nabokov

span.a: The New York Review of Books

div.p: I wandered into Lit 311 at the beginning of my sophomore year at Cornell in September 1954. The professor was Vladimir Nabokov, an émigré from tsarist Russia.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11kDUaY hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: DIARY OF A WIMP AT MIDDLE AGE

h2.a: 40 Years Of Icons: The Evolution Of The Modern Computer Interface

div.p: Alto introduced the WIMP interface — windows, icons, menus, pointer — that defines virtually every desktop GUI in use today. If the subsequent ubiquity is a measure of predictive accuracy, the Alto team must have been right in their theories about personal computing.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YtFacb hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: HAPPINESS IS NOT A WARM GUN

h2.a: Yoko Ono Tweeted Photo Of John Lennon’s Bloody Glasses To Make Point About Gun Violence

div.p: Ono tweeted the picture several times, each with different statements speaking out against gun violence and “turning this beautiful country into a war zone.”

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WMxYsj hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: IT ALL STARTED IN A VERY SEXY DINER

h2.a: The Origins Of The Terms Cheesecake And Beefcake

div.p: How did people start using the terms "cheesecake" and "beefcake" to describe hotties?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YvITmx hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: This Is The Madness Of Chess Boxing

div.p: What makes a better chess boxer, a boxer who can think strategically or a chess player who can throw a punch?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yre7hC hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Portraits Of Refugees Posing With Their Most Valued Possessions

div.p: If you had to quickly flee both your home and country, what one possession would you make sure you take with you? It’s a question that reveals a lot about your life and values, and, unfortunately, is one that many people around the world actually have to answer.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-164iqlm hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How Pi Was Nearly Changed To 3.2 And Copyrighted

div.p: This story has all the makings of weirdo Americana: bad amateur science, commercial ventures based upon the same, and a state legislature eager to embrace it all.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11s7ter hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: GET CONCESSIONS AT JABBA THE HUT

h2.a: Is Disneyland Getting A Star Wars Land?

div.p: In an online survey sent to Annual Pass holders and other park enthusiasts, Disney has apparently started to gauge interest in expanding the Star Wars presence at its resorts, starting with Disneyland.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15A0Kf2 hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: NOBODY'S GOING TO HARASS HIM THOUGH

h2.a: NFL Star Is Also A Congressional Intern

div.p: Raven's wide receiver Torrey Smith is an intern. Not some cushy glorified NFL intern for publicity – an intern intern.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZhcrmN hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: YOUR DAILY DOSE OF THE DAILY MAIL

h2.a: Cannibal Killer Known As Black Jesus Escapes Jail

div.p: The charming cult leader has been accused of murdering three girls and drinking their blood.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZEMAsi hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: THIS SHOULD BE A SEPARATE SPORT

h2.a: These Two Seconds Of Hockey Generated 44 Penalty Minutes

div.p: Want to watch something exciting and unusual that happened on the ice during an NHL game? Watch this video! Want to watch some hockey? Well, then don't watch this video.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-104EIzt hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: North Korean Video Features Its Army Taking 150,000 American Hostages

div.p: North Korea released a new promotional video in which the DPRK's army stages a massive attack on South Korea with paratroopers landing in Seoul and proceeding to take 150,000 U.S. citizens hostage.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11rUhGk hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Day Child Porn Went Viral On Facebook

div.p: A video of unknown origin appearing to show a grown man sexually abusing an infant girl went viral overnight on Facebook, garnering as many as 32,000 shares and over 5,000 likes before finally being removed by the website.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WIzVoj hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Mini-Skirts Could Become Illegal In South Korea

div.p: In the 1970s, the dictatorship controlling South Korea stipulated the length of women's skirts. Now, due to a new law, some in South Korea worry that those days are returning.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WFuo1U hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Inhalable 'Whisky Tornado' That Can Get You Drunk

div.p: Ever feel like getting drunk but don't want to actually consume any liquids? There's now a solution to this non-existant problem.
